queries.query:
SELECT mean("n_users") AS "mean_n_users" FROM "db0"."autogen"."system" WHERE time > 
:dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queries.query:
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("packets_recv")) AS "max_packets_recv", 
non_negative_derivative(max("packets_sent")) AS "max_packets_sent" FROM :DB:."autogen"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: AND 
"interface"=:interfaces: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText:

"interface"=:interfaces: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

= :interfaces: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queries.query:
SELECT mean("blocked") AS "mean_blocked", mean("running") AS "mean_running", 
mean("sleeping") AS "mean_sleeping", mean("stopped") AS "mean_stopped", mean("total") AS "mean_total", mean("dead") AS "mean_dead" FROM 
:DB:."autogen"."processes" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queries.query:
SELECT mean("tcp_close") AS "mean_tcp_close", mean("tcp_closing") AS "mean_tcp_closing", 
mean("tcp_listen") AS "mean_tcp_listen", mean("tcp_established") AS "mean_tcp_established" FROM :DB:."autogen"."netstat" WHERE time > 
:dashboardTime: AND "host"='maquina_miguel' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText:

"mean_tcp_closing", mean("tcp_listen") AS "mean_tcp_listen", mean("tcp_established") AS "mean_tcp_established" FROM :DB:."autogen"."netstat" WHERE 
time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"='maquina_miguel' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)
